local_intent: Lift the grasped bread upward by 0.1m to begin transfer while ensuring grasp stability.
assumptions: Bread is already grasped by the gripper
Upward path is collision-free for a small lift
coherence_with_global: Implements the MoveDelta(z=0.1, 800ms) lift after Pick and checks grasp stability before and after, matching the transfer phase of the global plan.
